title: Kangaroos. Part 2 [Greek version]
brief_description: Part Two examines various varieties of the Kangaroo, such as the Rat Kangaroo and the Quokkas. The manner in which the Kangaroo has been able to adapt its form to suit the peculiarities of a variety of environments is stressed. Some rare species are noted in the examination of the relationship between the animal and its habitat
